keywords.name: Infuse
keywords.description: Infusing a Flask activates its effects.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Flask. Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Lightning rod
keywords.description: All hits of Lightning target Lightning Rods.

keywords.name: Withdrawl
keywords.description: Effect triggers if no Flasks have been Infused this turn.
